name: Once Upon a Town
description:
You like dating sims? Well, how about a destroying-relationships sim?

For fairytale royalty, the Once-Upon-a-Town Ball is a popularity barometer – the most beloved royal wins. Unfortunately for them, you are the in-universe Twitter Queen, and you’ve just bet big money on the Ball winner. Now, you must dig out dirt on all the others – ensuring that not only your pick wins, but everybody else loses miserably! Choose your tweets wisely…

Writing: Anna Wawrzonkowska "Laurentina"
Graphics: Martyna "Lisza" Wasiluk
Programming: Zbyszek "Speego" Andrzejewski
Music: Michał Łazowik
